title: Улица
overview: The story of the inhabitants of one of the streets of a residential area of a big city. Schoolchildren and students, housewives and sellers, oligarchs and ordinary workers — more than 30 characters of different ages and social status will meet here, each of them has its own story. In the big universe of "The Street" there are no main and secondary characters, there is a stormy life with its joys, sorrows, incidents and shoals, fears, love experiences and tragedies. This is a story about all of us and our neighbors.
